headline: Is Innodata Stock's 4.65X PS Still Worth it? Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: INOD trades at a premium despite underperforming peers YTD, with margin pressure weighing on sentiment.

headline: Active ETF Assets Balloon. Why Only A Few Funds Dominate.
summary: Asset managers launched a record 660 active ETFs last year, according to a new research report from Broadridge Financial, but only a few may reach “escape velocity.”

headline: Q1 Earnings Highlights: EXL (NASDAQ:EXLS) Vs The Rest Of The Data & Business Process Services Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how EXL (NASDAQ:EXLS) and the rest of the data & business process services stocks fared in Q1.
